user.title: Connect Google Nest x Yale
user.description: Paste your Issue Token URL and Cookies from your Nest web session.

reauth.description: Your Nest session expired. Paste a new Issue Token URL and Cookies.

init.title: Nest Yale options
init.description: Tune optional behavior without changing defaults.
